overview:
Before launching CardWiX, Graceâ€™s career ambitions and passions led her around the world where she learned about law, information technology, and the value of hard work.

When she experienced the pain of manually transcribing contacts firsthand, Graceâ€™s problem-solving instincts kicked into overdrive. She literally drew her concepts on paper hoping that she could solve the pain of manually transcribing contact lists. The result was a software-as-a service (SaaS) business model, and guaranteed to give 100% data accuracy. It took well over a year of research and testing, but she created CardWiX from scratch.

milestones.description: CardWiX added Grace Sales as Founder, CEO
